issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Fix "is true" and "is false" functions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15848](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15848). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Modifying the behavior of the function to consider false when it comes to null.

More detail:
The functions "istrue" and "isfalse" were replace from null_if_null to null_never in gandiva.
